proof_script:
lemma Gram_Schmidt_column_k_row_code[code abstract]: "vec_nth (Gram_Schmidt_column_k_row A k a) = (%b. (if b = from_nat k then (column b A - (\<Sum>x\<in>{column i A|i. i < b}. ((column b A) \<bullet> x / (x \<bullet> x)) *\<^sub>R x)) else (column b A)) $ a)"
unfolding Gram_Schmidt_column_k_row_def[abs_def]
by auto

unfolding Gram_Schmidt_column_k_row_def[abs_def]
by auto
